A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The entire movie is a letdown.  Luke does not deserve the misguided writing that damages his character and makes little to no sense.  The movie has many flaws when looked at closely and is in no way consistent with the original idealogy of the Jedi's.  There is also random super powers that Jedi's now have that are inconsistent.  Will be tough for the franchise to come back after this one.
